senses.sense_definition: A member of any of the peoples of Europe who speak the Slavic languages.

examples.text: Many <w>Slavs</w> settled in this region during the migration period.
Historians study the ancient <w>Slavs</w> to understand the cultural roots of Eastern Europe.

senses.sense_definition: The Slavonian grebe, a water bird found in northern regions.

examples.text: The birdwatcher was excited to spot a rare <w>Slav</w> on the lake.
We observed the nesting habits of the <w>Slav</w> near the reeds.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to the Slavic peoples, their languages, or their cultures.

examples.text: She spoke French with a very <w>Slav</w> accent.
The architecture in the old town has a distinctly <w>Slav</w> character.
